name: NSWritingDirectionFormatType
desc: Constants for the writing direction attribute key.

items.name: case embedding
items.desc: Text is embedded in text with another writing direction. For example, an English quotation in the middle of an Arabic sentence could be marked as being embedded left-to-right text.

items.name: case override
items.desc: Enables character types with inherent directionality to be overridden when required for special cases, such as for part numbers made of mixed English, digits, and Hebrew letters to be written from right to left.
